name: Carnegie Mellon Informatics and Mathematics Competition
descript: I am a member of the founding year organization team of the Carnegie Mellon Informatics and Mathematics Competition for high schoolers. I worked on the logistics, solution writing, grading, and other miscellaneous tasks for the competition.

name: Carnegie Mellon University, Neuroscience Department, Barth Lab
descript: I started working in Professor Alison Barth's lab when I took a research for credit course with her in the spring 2016 semester. I am continuing my work from this research project.

name: Max Planck Florida Institute for Neuroscience, Kwon Lab
descript: I worked in Professor Hyungbae Kwon's lab during the Summer Research Program at the Max Planck Florida Institute for Neuroscience. I worked on the mathematics of a virtual reality system based on a cylindcrical screen used to monitor the brain activity of learning mice in vivo.
